Text: Stopped over to check on my friend and his wife and he tells me that there have been a lot of new visits to his web site. I want to thank all of you VERY MUCH for at least looking. You guys are the best! As I mentioned before, if you ever need their services please go to www.someguyssigns.com and you will not be disappointed. Their signs are the best! that's actually how I met them. I ordered a sign from them when my wife and I were on vacation. Wonderful people!
